assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Atypical_Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome_Initial_First_Presentation_of_Recurrent_Q10
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: h) Medication induced TMA: provide a list of all medications the patient was exposed to within 1 month of disease onset. If this includes any of the following, a detailed explanation must be provided explaining why the original presentation was not secondary to medication-related TMA: a. Cisplatin; Gemcitabine; Mitomycin; Clopidogrel/ ticlopidine; Quinine; Interferon α,β; Anti-vascular endothelial growth factor; alemtuzumab; Cyclosporine / tacrolimus; Ciprofloxacin; Illicit drugs [e.g. cocaine, heroin, ecstasy]; proteasome inhibitors
